Steps.Name: Hinge Deeply
Steps.Description: Rock your butt backward and fold your torso level. Your shoulders should drop to the same level as your hips. The handlebars will rotate forward and down. This is the position you'll use when you're riding down anything steep.

Steps.Name: Hip/Hand Drive
Steps.Description: Drive your hips and hands toward each other. Keep your torso engaged. Fire your glutes. Boom! Your should end up standing perfectly upright. This is the position you'll use then you're riding up anything steep.

Steps.Name: Hinge Deeply
Steps.Description: Rock your butt backward and fold your torso level. Your shoulders should drop to the same level as your hips. The handlebars will rotate forward and down. This is the position you'll use when you're riding down anything steep.

Steps.Name: Arm Pull/Push
Steps.Description: Pull and Push your arms using lats and chest muscles and stabilizing your core in the deep hinge position during the movement.

Steps.Name: Low Hinge
Steps.Description: Rock your butt backward and fold your torso level. Your shoulders should drop to the same level as your hips. The handlebars will rotate forward and down. This is the position you'll use when you're riding down anything steep.

Steps.Name: High Hinge Pull
Steps.Description: From Low Hinge move to High Hinge while pulling with lats, posterior deltoids, biceps

Steps.Name: Low Hinge Push
Steps.Description: From High Hing move to Low Hinge while pushing with chest, anterior deltoids, triceps

Steps.Name: Hinge Deeply
Steps.Description: Rock your butt backward and fold your torso level. Your shoulders should drop to the same level as your hips. The handlebars will rotate forward and down. This is the position you'll use when you're riding down anything steep.

Steps.Name: Hip Drive/High Hinge Pull
Steps.Description: Drive your hips and hands toward each other. Keep your torso engaged. Fire your glutes. Before reaching full standing extension begin then next Low Hinge Push then into Arm Push

Steps.Name: Low Hinge Push/Arm Push
Steps.Description: Pull and Push your arms using lats and chest muscles and stabilizing your core in the deep hinge position during the movement. Before reaching full arm extension Begin the next Hip Drive then back into High Hinge Pull

Steps.Name: Anti-Row to the Right
Steps.Description: Starting from Right Foot Forward High Hinge, Anti-Row rotating hips to the left and behind the Rip Row seat

Steps.Name: Row and Center Hips back to High Hinge
Steps.Description: Row back to High Hinge and Rotate Hips back to centered over bottom bracket

Steps.Name: Anti-Row to the Left
Steps.Description: Starting from Left Foot Forward High Hinge, Anti-Row rotating hips to the right and behind the Rip Row seat

Steps.Name: Row and Center Hips back to High Hinge
Steps.Description: Row back to High Hinge and Rotate Hips back to centered over bottom bracket

Steps.Name: Anti-Row to the Left
Steps.Description: Starting from Left Foot Forward High Hinge, Anti-Row rotating hips to the right and behind the Rip Row seat

Steps.Name: Row and Center Hips back to High Hinge
Steps.Description: Row back to High Hinge and Rotate Hips back to centered over bottom bracket
